text: Rosemary Johnson (1913–1972) was a British actress. She is referred to in some sources as Rosemary Groom-Johnson. Johnson worked mostly in television. A notable role was as the telephone operator Hilda Rowse in the 1964 Doctor Who serial Planet of Giants.https://www.bbc.co.uk/doctorwho/classic/episodeguide/planetofgiants/detail.shtml ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |1958 |Starr and Company |Maggie |Episode: Bank Holiday Outing |- |1959 |The Common Room |woman |Episode: The Major |- |1960 |Heller in Pink Tights |Tightrope-walker |uncredited |- |1964 |Planet of Giants |Hilda Rowse |Episode: Crisis |- |1967 |Champion House |Mrs Baker |Episode: The Suggestion Box |- |1971 |Shadows of Fear |Marian |Episode: White Walls and Olive Green Carpets |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1913 births Category:1972 deaths Category:British television actresses Category:20th-century British actresses
title: Rosemary Johnson
